name: Soul Checkout
description: It's the year 22XX. Humans have aqquired the technology to have their minds run on quantum computers, making them practically immune to most kinds of physical injuries. In the last decade a so-called 'full-emersion VR experience' game hase become more and more popular. people bet on surviving the longest in this virtual shooter environment, but of course, everything has a price: one you can only pay with your mental health...
